snippet.title: ZX Spectrum Longplay [262] Ad Astra (EU)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: SCHLAUCHI

Ad Astra is an arcade shooter game developed by Carter Follis Software Associates and published by Gargoyle Games in 1984. The game is set in deep space and features intense battles against pirate battle-cruisers, robot scout ships, and mine-layers. Players take on the role of a pilot in the Deep Space Patrol and must navigate through deadly mines and interstellar debris while shooting down enemy ships.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
